```
studentizedResiduals(setting)
```

与えられた回帰設定のためのStudentized残差を計算します。

# 引数:

  * `setting::RegressionSetting`: 回帰設定オブジェクト。

# 例

```julia-repl
julia> reg = createRegressionSetting(@formula(calls ~ year), phones);

julia> studentizedResiduals(reg)
24-element Vector{Float64}:
  0.2398783264505892
  0.1463945666608097
  0.04934549995087145
 -0.023289236798461784
 -0.10408303320973748
 -0.18382934382804111
 -0.2609395640240455
 -0.33934473417314376
 -0.3973205657179429
 -0.46258080183149236
 -0.5261488085924144
 -0.5918396227060093
 -0.6616423337899147
 -0.6611792918262785
  1.0277190922689816
  1.0297863954540103
  1.2712201589839855
  1.4974523565936426
  1.8386296155264197
  2.316394853333409
 -0.9368354141338643
 -1.4009989983319822
 -1.4541520919831887
 -1.529459974327181
```
